Text.Page:
Those cultists have started to summon demons. The demons are now getting ready to leave the Cathedral. If we let this be, all our work in subjugating the monsters will be in vein.

Eliminate the {@LinkCreature:25#2051#cruel fimbrilisks}. Don't try this aloneâ€”be sure to bring your comrades.
Nice work! There's still more cultists than I can count, but it's a start.
Eliminate the cruel fimbrilisks and bring back the creatures' core.
